subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Part of a word family referring to any cover that one slips over something; cognate with {{och-l|冑|helmet}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} reconstructs the word with a ''*s-'' suffix, which could play an iterative role, as sleeves come in pairs.
